author: djrtwo
content:
Networking call this Wednesday -- https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/issues/137
Major goal is to discuss the challenges in the attestation aggregation/subnet strategy. Other than v0.11 conformance, this is one of the major blockers for mc-testnets, and after having some discussions with teams, there are a number of edge-cases and issue to work through. We'll do a bit of knowledge sharing, discussion, and assess if anything in the spec can/should be tweaked to simplify things

Eth2 call this Thurdsay -- https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/issues/135
General structure, plus we'll spend some time discussing the coming mc-testnets
